reviews.review: This is literally my favorite video game ever, and it's made by valve so you pretty much know it's going to be quality shit. Just play the damn game and stop looking at reviews, you know you'll succumb eventually.
单机有剧情，合作有脑洞
联机双人通关了，趣味性满分。  有些关卡要琢磨一下，玩惯了RPG可以试试这个。
This game is a hilarious, infuriating game.

Great game to watch your friends plummet to their death after you sent them flying through a portal

Most of the time - I don't play 1st person games due to mostly, not enjoying them.  This game has taught me that 1st person games can be just as fun as all the other games.  I loved every single moment of portal 1 and 2.  Portal 2 really blows away Portal 1 with the story-line, however, both have an amazing story-line.  I'd highly recommend it! I hope someday to see the story continue.

so brilliant
not as good as 1, but thats basically impossible
hilarious throughout, great puzzles, great co-op with the best puzzles of the game, and amazing voice acting
one of the greatest games of all time
This is the best puzzle game ever.  :)
Absolute classic. A must own. You don't own it? why not? go buy it. you own it? why are you reading this? Go play it. Make life take the lemons back.
I've played this and the first one through multiple times -- on my xbox and here on steam. Great game with a great story, but you've played this before, because you're a pc gamer.
Best game I've ever played, I recommend this to everyone, it has an excellent story that made me tear up. Plus, it has a multiplayer version which is basically a whole other game.

Very good game although my team mate was a spacker.

Strongly advise you do coop with someone smarter than a chicken.

Thanks

Big Nate xx

es intuitivo, simple, profundo en contenido y con diálogos (o monólogos?) de gran calidad, que van explicando la historia de manera muy efectiva.

10/10

여태 본적없는 참신한 물건과 오브젝트로 퍼즐이 진행되어 뇌가 혹사당하는 느낌이 든다 굉장히 재밌고 퍼즐도 잘 짜여있으며 플레이어를 농락하는듯한 퍼즐을 클리어 했을때의 그 희열감이 최고다 다만 길찾기를 비롯한 여러가지가 넓은 시야를 요구하는대다 길도 배배꼬여서 시야가 짧으면 게임이 진행이 안됨
진심으로 길찾다가 포탈 환불할까 생각까지 해봄

its a really good game like when i heard about the concept i was like welp here we go again another cash grab sequal to the original but i like how different the story is and how it has CO OP witch is really fun to play with freinds but i wish you could have more players than 2 so overall 10 out of 10 game
Just play it. Do it. You won't regret it.

был робот который сошол с ума и наачал все ломать, но его свергли и ломать начал тот робот,
 который помогал и в итоге ты стал с роботом который сначала все ломал , который превратился вкартошку
Quite good but be sure to have a  teammate with more than 3 braincells.
Ахуенно в коопе 3 часа говорил сам с собой потому что вырубило микро спс валве
Muy buen juego, el pensamiento rápido y estrategias se juntan en algunas ocasiones, donde tienes que responder rápidamente o de otra manera, llega tu fin.
Very fun co-op, really makes your brain think.

Es un juego que supera con creces a su anterior entrega, hay muchas mecánicas nuevas que hacen más interesante y retadora esta secuela, aunque si no te has pasado el primero y entras de lleno con Portal 2 sí llega a ser algo agotador si no tienes tanta destreza mental, cosa que me sucedió, pero a pesar de eso no es un juego que no se disfrute en tanto historia, jugabilidad, detalle e interactividad. Lo recomiendo bastante.
é um clássico, vai fazer os neurônios dos players fritarem.

Guys, I can't wait for Portal 3 to come out!

hmm yes very good i have played four hours on steam but on my old xbox 360 this was my whole entire day
la historia y jugabilidad son geniales, pero si te pone a pensar mucho para lograr avanzar, entretiene bastante.
Winter sale brings this down to 99 cents......Don't have the game? Get it already.

This game is AMAZING.  If you like puzzles and RPGs, then this game is definitely for you.  It features a great story, great characters, and perfectly balanced (as all things should be) difficulty.  Seriously, GET THIS GAME NOW.
Uno dei migliori del suo genere, invecchiato benissimo.

If you thought the first game was good... this one is about 100 times better!

The story in Portal 2 is way better then the first game.
The graphics are amazing for being made so long ago!
Plus there are a lot of fun things you can learn about Aperture Science. Along with a link with Half-Life 2.

HAVE FUN!
Great way to see other's problem solving approach.
try it!!!!!!!!!! i love the dangeros vibe of this game . you dont have to play portal 1 to know how this works !!!!
great game, not much story but its fun, a few hours of singleplayer gameplay + multiplayer fun - online and splitscreen
Amazing and challenging story & Amazing 2 player challenges (I just wish they had voice communication)

You CANNOT die before playing this Perfect Game! No Gamer should!

Nothing is Perfect, but this... I just can't find any imperfection!

Avant de commencer, je voudrais surtout dire que c'est ma deuxième évaluation, et que je n'en fais pas souvent ! Il y aura sans doute des avis mieux construits, mais je souhaite vraiment vous donner mon avis juste après avoir fini le jeu (en solo, le coop étant fini depuis quelques jours) !

Portal 2 est un jeu d'énigmes futuristes, jouable seul, ou en coop (à 2 joueurs par Internet). Histoire d'éviter de faire un pavé illisible, je vais aborder quelques points.

1) Les énigmes et la durée de vie
Portal 2 possède de nombreuses énigmes plus ou moins complexes, et diversifiées, également différentes du premier opus. La prise en main est progressive, et à titre personnel, je n'ai pas ressenti de lassitude en avançant dans le jeu ! Avec une cinquantaine d'épreuves en solo (des niveaux très courts qui se résolvent en moins d'une minute à des plus complexes s'enchaînant), et environ autant en coop, le jeu se termine en une quinzaine d'heures pour ceux qui ne font pas particulièrement les succès.

2) L'ambiance
Un autre point réussi du jeu, puisque les graphismes sont assez beaux (ils ne sont évidemment pas comparables à ceux de 2019 mais ils ne piquent pas l'oeil). Les musiques sont également agréables, tantôt calmes ou tantôt plus sombres si besoin est. Les lumières sont bien dosées, et l'on prête attention aux différents personnages par envie de comprendre ce qu'il a bien pu se passer pour en arriver là dans l'histoire.
